NAME: Amit Kumar Garg
ABOUT:
Amit is a Chief Financial Officer. He is the Co Founder of WinPE, a not-for-profit initiative to enhance gender diversity in the investing ecosystem (www.winpeforum.com). 

Amit brings an approach focused on partnering with the CEO and Board, using a strong combination of finance and business strategy to elevate business performance and results. Amit has been the CFO of MarketsandMarkets, NIIT Technologies and Intertek. He has also worked with American Express, Fidelity International and PriceWaterhouseCoopers.

Amit has 25+ years of deep experience in finance functions with expertise in driving value and wealth creation through operational efficiencies, and managing strategic initiatives for organizations. His breadth of experience includes corporate finance, corporate restructuring, M&A, investor relations, cash management, controllership, setting up offshore finance functions, solving complex finance problems of global magnitude, operational efficiency projects targeting margin enhancements, financial compliance, and managing global finance projects.

Amit holds a Master’s degree in Business Administration from the MIT Sloan School of Management, has advance education from Harvard Business School, and is a Chartered Accountant.
